calls.message: Hello, good morning. My name is Grace Johnson, and I am leaving this message because I have noticed something disturbing in my house. During the nights, I hear noises like something scratching inside the walls, especially in the kitchen. This morning I found small black pellets in the pantry and a nibbled cereal packet. There is also a strange smell near the cabinets, like something rancid. Please, I need guidance on what to do before this gets worse. Thank you.

Hi, I'm Ricardo Lopez, and I wanted to report something strange that I've noticed in my house. Every time I turn on the kitchen light at night, I see something small and fast running towards the corners or under the sink. I have also found food scraps with small holes and an unpleasant smell near the garbage disposal. I don't know how to get rid of them, and they seem to be increasing. I hope you can help me. Thank you.

Hi, I'm Clara Martinez. I'm concerned because I discovered small specks of dust near my door and window frames. Upon closer inspection, I noticed that the wood looks like it is hollow in some places, and there are some tiny tunnels in the walls. I also saw small winged insects near the lights a couple of days ago. Please, I need guidance to resolve this before it gets worse.
Se requiere tratamiento inmediato en el sitio.
